Html:
I came across an error in nested comments and when I searched, I could find that it is in the todo list (P9: Support for nested comments). In the discussion page, I saw a discussion about pull request on this. Can you please tell when the fixed code will be available?

Thanks,
Sreeja.

Sorry, can't promise anything, too busy with other things, daytime job and other project. Didn't make updates in a long time. Try to figure out something from discussions or hunt in clone repos.
Roman
